WorkItem.Description:
Hello,
 
I tried to use AutoMapper on a WP7 project.
 
At runtime, at the start of the app I get the following exception :
 
Could not load type 'AutoMapper.Mapper' from assembly 'AutoMapper, Version=1.1.0.188, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=BE96CD2C38EF1005'.
 
I know the Silverlight engine on WP7 is somewhere between Silverlight 3 and Silverlight 4.
 
Is there a fundamental problem with what I am trying to do?
 
Thanks
